form_description: Form to record excavator details for shift-wise production report.

fields.description: The name of the subsidiary managing this report
fields.label: Name of Subsidiary
fields.name: name_1
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the subsidiary

fields.description: The name of the mine where the report is being generated
fields.label: Name of the Mine
fields.name: name_2
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the mine

fields.description: The shift during which the report is applicable
fields.label: Shift
fields.name: shift

fields.description: The specific pit or patch covered in this report
fields.label: Name of the Pit/Patch
fields.name: name_3
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the pit or patch

fields.description: The contractor responsible for the work
fields.label: Name of the Contractor
fields.name: name_4
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the contractor

fields.description: The date for which the report is being prepared
fields.label: Date
fields.name: name_5

fields.description: The shift during which the report is applicable
fields.label: Shift
fields.name: name_6

fields.description: Name or number of the excavator
fields.label: Name / No.
fields.name: name_8

fields.description: Details of the bench where the excavator is working
fields.label: Bench
fields.name: name_9

fields.label: OB Quantity - Solid
fields.name: name_10
fields.placeholder: Enter solid OB quantity (in cubic meters)

fields.label: OB Quantity - Rehandling
fields.name: name_11
fields.placeholder: Enter rehandling OB quantity (in cubic meters)

fields.label: OB Quantity - Total
fields.name: name_12
fields.placeholder: Enter total OB quantity (in cubic meters)
